Package org.husky.common.utils.xml

Class XmlSchemaValidator

java.lang.Object
org.husky.common.utils.xml.XmlSchemaValidator
@DefaultQualifier(value=org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull.class, locations={PARAMETER,RETURN}) @ThreadSafe public class XmlSchemaValidator extends Object
A validator of XML documents against an XML Schema Definition (XSD) file.
Author:
Quentin Ligier
Implementation Note:
The Validator is not thread-safe and therefore instanced again at each validation.

  • Constructor Details

    • XmlSchemaValidator

      public XmlSchemaValidator(URL schemaUrl) throws SAXException
      Constructor.

      Instantiates the XSD Schema and configures the future validator against XXE injections and for external resources resolving (the XSD Schema includes external definitions).

      Parameters:
      schemaUrl - The XSD Schema URL.
      Throws:
      SAXException - if the XML Schema file is not valid.
      See Also:
      • XML External Entity Prevention Cheat Sheet

  • Method Details

    • validate

      public void validate(String documentContent) throws javax.xml.bind.ValidationException
      Validates an XML document against its XML Schema.
      Parameters:
      documentContent - The document content.
      Throws:
      javax.xml.bind.ValidationException - if the document is invalid.

    • validate

      public void validate(File documentFile) throws javax.xml.bind.ValidationException, IOException
      Validates an XML document against its XML Schema.
      Parameters:
      documentFile - The document file.
      Throws:
      javax.xml.bind.ValidationException - if the document is invalid.
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist or is not readable.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • validate

      public void validate(Source source) throws javax.xml.bind.ValidationException
      Validates an XML document against its XML Schema.
      Parameters:
      source - The document source.
      Throws:
      javax.xml.bind.ValidationException - if the document is invalid.
